channel.title: outofmemory.io
channel.description: You can't always apt-get what you want

item.title: Ruby (and Jekyll) on Mac
item.description: How to install a current version of Ruby on macOS Mojave - Jekyll requires Ruby 2.4 or higher. Trying to install Jekyll on my Macbook I noticed that the version shipped with Mojave is 2.3.something. There are a couple of ways to solve this. homebrew The first one is using homebrew. Provided that you have installed it before, it is just a...

item.title: OS lifecycle
item.description: Release and EOL/EOSL dates for most common Operating Systems - (Work in progress…) Warning: Use at your own risk. CentOS OS name Release date EOL EOSL CentOS 8 CentOS 7 2014/07/07 Q4 2020 2024/06/30 CentOS 6 2011/07/10 2017/07/10 2020/11/30 CentOS 5 2007/04/12 2014/03/31 2017/03/31 CentOS 4 2005/03/09 2009/03/31 2012/02/29 Debian OS name Release date EOL EOSL Debian...

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when...

item.title: Resize encrypted disk in macOS
item.description:
To increase size of volume Encrypted in 250 MB:
hdiutil resize -size 250m /Users/me/Encrypted/Encrypted.dmg

item.title: Saltándose los controles de la Powershell
item.description: Mecanismos de bypass para la PowerShell ExecutionPolicy - En una de las charlas a las que acude con frecuencia -bueno, creo que en varias :)-, Pablo González estuvo explicando diferentes posibilidades para ejecutar scripts en PowerShell “saltándose” los controles de ejecución (ExecutionPolicy). La ExecutionPolicy determina qué scripts PowerShell tienen autorización para ejecutarse en un sistema. Windows ofrece cuatro...

item.title: First post!
item.description:
This is my first post, how exciting!
Note: Why is this called first post when it is not the first post? Because this is just the first Jekyll post.

item.title: Reverse shells
item.description: Situación: encontrado un método de RCE pero sin posibilidad de acceso a la shell. Solución: bind de la shell a un puerto TCP. netcat Esto ya lo vimos hace tiempo en este articulo. Lo que ocurre es que: nc/netcat no siempre estará disponible si lo está, es posible que no...

item.title: Uso de netcat
item.description: netcat Netcat es una utilidad que permite el envío y recepción de datos vía TCP/UDP desde la consola. Inicialmente desarrollada para Unix, se ha portado al menos a Windows y OS X. Hay varios forks con distintas capacidades; en resumen, está en todas partes y sirve para… muchas cositas. Sintaxis...

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a...
